title: Taiwan Taichung Area March 23, 2024 - Biomass Burning PM2.5 Map
description: Hourly PM2.5 data from various devices in Taichung area on March 23, 2024. from 8:00 to 19:00

hour.description: The hour of the day (24-hour format) when the measurement was taken.

lat.description: The latitude coordinate where the measurement was taken.

lon.description: The longitude coordinate where the measurement was taken.

value.description: The measured concentration value of PM2.5 in the air.

deviceId.description: The identifier of the device that recorded the measurement.

sensorId.description: The identifier of the specific sensor on the device that recorded the measurement.
